channel.title: Oakley Clubface OX3102 – Men’s Designer Eyewear
channel.description: Oakley started out as one man with $300 working from his garage. It has now turned into a multi-billion dollar corporation. Taken over and now owned by Italian firm, Luxottica, who also boast Vogue and Ray Ban in their portfolio, Oakley are now a worldwide designer eyewear manufacturer. Started in 1975 by Jim Jannard, Oakley [...]
